commit message: Add readme about supported and unsupported specifications.
Fix INSTALL_FAILED_NO_MATCHING_ABIS when deploying sample-integration-android.
Workaround for main screen cannot be opened from Lollipop recents (https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=82185).
Fix missing locale in string format.
Remove alignment workaround; found a better fix.
For the transactions list, consolidate label cache with transaction cache. Addresses are rarely reused these days, so the label cache wasn't very effective any more.
In transactions list, print addresses in less significant color.
Sanitize BitPay memos.
Add RFC 6979 to supported specifications.
Add more drawable padding for action buttons with text.
Fix text color of disabled action bar buttons.
Don't move right border of transaction when selected, and make menu button a bit smaller.
Transaction confidence indicator shall stay on the top left even for selected cards.
Remove ActionMode from send coins screen.
Update Albanian localization from Transifex.
Add Croatian localization from Transifex.
Update Greek localization from Transifex.
Add Hindi localization from Transifex.
Refresh assets for Google Play.
Make pane titles a bit smaller.
Make list empty messages a bit smaller.
Layout cosmetics for wide screens.
Don't offer to restore from unencrypted backups. It's just too dangerous.
When restoring from a backup, show directory which is being scanned.
